SEARCH
Package com.example.eventease.data

Interface ProfileRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
FirebaseProfileRepository
public interface ProfileRepository
Repository interface for user profile operations. Provides methods to retrieve and update user profiles. This interface follows the Repository pattern to abstract data access operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Profile>
    get(String uid)
    Retrieves a user profile by user ID.
    com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void>
    upsert(String uid, Profile p)
    Creates or updates a user profile.

  • Method Details

    • get

      com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Profile> get(String uid)
      Retrieves a user profile by user ID.
      Parameters:
      uid - the unique user identifier
      Returns:
      a Task that completes with the Profile, or null if not found

    • upsert

      com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> upsert(String uid, Profile p)
      Creates or updates a user profile. If a profile with the given UID exists, it will be updated; otherwise, a new profile will be created.
      Parameters:
      uid - the unique user identifier
      p - the profile data to save
      Returns:
      a Task that completes when the profile is saved
